A source and an observer are located at the same point. The source starts moving away from the observer at t = 0, with a constant acceleration a. If natural frequency of the source is n0 and speed of sound in air is v, then frequency received by the observer at time t will be ?

A whistle is rotated with 2 rotations/sec in a circle of radius 1 meter. A listener is sitting in the plane of circle outside the centre, then ratio of maximum and minimum frequencies heard by him will be?

A jet fighter flies in a straight line over an airfield line over an airfield with a speed 264 m/s level with the ground, at a height of 600 m. If it emits a continuous note of frequency 1kHz, what is the change in apparent frequency as experienced by one of the ground crew over a 1.5 s interval as the jet flies overhead?

(Assume speed of sound is 340 ms-1)
A transverse wave described by y = (0.02m) sin [(1.0 m-1) x + (30s-1) t] propagates on a stretched string having a linear mass density of 1.2 × 10-4 kg/m. Find the tension in the string?
What number of beats will be produced by a drummer in a concert if he uses three sound waves having equal amplitudes of frequencies (v−2), v, (v+2) which superpose to give a beat?
A stationary wave is given by, y=Asinπx2cosπ2t where A,x,y are in cm and t is in seconds. Find the distance (in cm) between the adjacent nodes whose superposition can give rise to this vibration?

A pipe of 52 cm long and open at both the ends produces harmonics. Which harmonic mode of pipe resonates a 2.6 kHz source?

Given speed of sound in air = 280 m s-1

A train is moving at a speed of 64 m/s towards a source (fixed on the platform) of radiation of frequency 50 GHz. What will be the beat frequency if the radiation reflected by the train is superposed with the emitted radiation?

A toy-car blowing its horn, is moving with a steady speed of 6 m/s, away from a wall. An observer, towards whom the toy car is moving, is able to hear 6 beats per second if the velocity of sound in air is 280 m/s, the frequency of the horn in Hz of the toy car is close to?
A steel rod 300 cm long is clamped at its-mid-point. The fundamental frequency of longitudinal vibrations of the rod is given to be 4.26 kHz. What is the speed of sound in steel?

Two tuning forks A and B having frequency of 600 Hz each are placed with B to the ring to the right of A. An observer is between the forks and is moving towards B with a speed of 20 m/s.The speed of sound is 350 m/s and the wind speed is 10 m/s from A to B. Calculate the difference in the two frequencies heard by the observer?

A person going away from a factory on his bike at a speed of 18 km/hr, listens to the siren of the factory. If the main frequency of the siren is 500 Hz and a strong wind is blowing along the direction of the bike at 18 km/hr. What will be the main frequency heard by the person?

Two sine wave travel in the same direction in a medium. The amplitude of each wave is A and the phase difference between the two waves is 60˚.The resultant amplitude will be?
A sound source of frequency 250 Hz completes one revolution in 3 sec is revolving in a circle of radius 10 m. The maximum frequency heard at a point 20 m from the center of the circle?

(ii) if observer is behind the train

y1 = a1 cos (ωt – kx) and
